data.eml:eml: New substitute name for the genus Poliocoris Slater, 1994 (Hemiptera, Heteroptera, Rhyparochromidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Zhang, Dao-Wei, Chen, Jing (2015): New substitute name for the genus Poliocoris Slater, 1994 (Hemiptera, Heteroptera, Rhyparochromidae). ZooKeys 478: 147-148, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.478.9063, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.478.9063
